nodes.text: The Colonial Station Chaf system was a star system that was located within the Chiss Space area of the Unknown Regions. It was connected by a hyperlane to the Rhigar system and to regions lying south of the core territory of the Chiss Ascendancy, the government of the Chiss species. The system shared its name with the Chaf family, one of the Chiss Ruling Families.
The Colonial Station Chaf system was first mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, authored by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace, which placed it in grid square F-9.
